title: Debugging apps running in Kubernetes
subtitle: An overview of the tooling available
abstract: New tools are coming out to make it possible to add breakpoints and debug running code in a Kubernetes Pod. This talk will present an overview of some of these tools. We'll cover tools that make it easy to update the code that's running in a Pod (Skaffold/Ksync/Telepresence). And we'll also cover how to connect your IDE to the code and set breakpoints.
description:
• A really brief, high level overview of k8s pods & how to run an application there
  • List out some the tools available that make debugging possible
  • Overview of how each tool differs
  • A demo of 2 different debugging tools
